INSECURE_CLIENT_CREDENTIALS: You are passing clientId / secretKey directly into the app while not in sandboxMode. This is NOT safe for production: anyone can decompile the app and steal your PayPal keys. Recommended production setup: - Move all PayPal calls (access token, create order/payment, capture) to your backend. - Use the `approvalUrl` callback so the client only receives the checkout URL.
ACCESS_TOKEN_NETWORK_ERROR: Unable to proceed, check your internet connection.
